Bookshelf.Title: Range: Why Generalists Triumph in a Specialized World
Bookshelf.Quote: “Seeing small pieces of a larger jigsaw puzzle in isolation, no matter how hi-def the picture, is insufficient to grapple with humanity’s greatest challenges.”

Bookshelf.Title: Superforecasting: The Art and Science of Prediction
Bookshelf.Author(s): Philip E. Tetlock and Dan Gardner
Bookshelf.Quote: “For scientists, not knowing is exciting. It’s an opportunity to discover; the more that is unknown, the greater the opportunity.”

Bookshelf.Title: The Uninhabitable Earth: Life After Warming
Bookshelf.Quote: “Climate change is fast, much faster than it seems we have the capacity to recognize and acknowledge; but it is also long, almost longer than we can truly imagine.”

Bookshelf.Title: 21 Lessons for the 21 Century
Bookshelf.Quote: “In a world deluged by irrelevant information, clarity is power.”
